entry.title: DenrimScript
entry.content: Released a first version of my scripting language DenrimScript which features CPU AND GPU support via compute shader functions. Based on the great book Crafting Interpreters from @munificentbob.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content: Welcome to my blog! Here I will write about my open source applications like Signed and ShaderMania and about graphic development for macOS and iOS in general.
